description: Outdoor pants for the adventurous man, the Raid is made from comfortable nylon that resists abrasion, water and wind. Always ready for adventure, these convertible pants can be worn as pants or Bermuda shorts. Breathable, it dries quickly and fits easily in the bottom of a suitcase or backpack, in addition to protecting you from the sun's rays thanks to its anti-UV finish. Convertible design pants that will follow you on all your hikes!
name: Chlorophylle Raid Zip Off Pants - Mens
